title: The Language of Creation | with Matthieu Pageau
description:
Matthieu Pageau's book, The Language of Creation: Cosmic Symbolism in Genesis is now available on Amazon.  Matthieu and I discuss the impetus for writing such a book on Biblical symbolism.  We look at the basic ideas in the book as well as how these answer the major problems we are faced today in terms of world view.  

Amazon.com
https://amzn.to/2xmHBHH

Amazon.ca
https://amzn.to/2kxILXz

Amazon.co.uk
https://amzn.to/2IZDJSw

Podcast with Don Hoffman:  
https://after-on.com/episodes/026

Those who wish to support Matthieu financially:
Paypal - 
https://www.paypal.me/matthieupageau

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=11431559

My links

Support this channel:
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.pageaucarvings.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jonathanpageau
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan
